member.name: IApplicationDocumentLists.GetList
member.summary: Retrieves an object that represents the collection of destinations listed in the Recent or Frequent category in a Jump List.

param.name: listtype
param.para: One of the following values that specifies from which category the list of destinations should be retrieved.
0x0. The Recent category, which lists those items most recently accessed.
0x1. The Frequent category, which lists the items that have been accessed the greatest number of times.

member.param: The number of items to retrieve from the list specified in listtype. Set this parameter to 0 to retrieve the full list.
A reference to the IID of the interface to retrieve through ppv, typically IID_IObjectArray or IID_IEnumObjects.

When this method returns, contains the interface pointer requested in riid. This is typically an or which represents a collection of or objects (or a mix of the two) that represent the retrieved items from the list.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationDocumentLists.SetAppID
member.summary: Specifies a unique Application User Model ID (AppUserModelID) for the application whose destination lists are being retrieved. This method is optional.
member.param: A pointer to the AppUserModelID of the process whose taskbar button representation receives the Jump List.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IApplicationDocumentLists
member.summary: Exposes methods that allow an application to retrieve the contents of the Recent or Frequent categories in a Jump List.
